item.description: @markguim Probably true. I‚Äôd say go used if you can which will limit any investment loss. 150cc scooter is great for learning on or for continuing to use for around town / non-highway commute. But once you get the üèç bug, then you‚Äôll be looking to upgrade.
item.source:markdown: @markguim Probably true. I‚Äôd say go used if you can which will limit any investment loss. 150cc scooter is great for learning on or for continuing to use for around town / non-highway commute. But once you get the üèç bug, then you‚Äôll be looking to upgrade.

item.description: @markguim I was riding a 2021 Honda PCX earlier this year. Still have it but got my full Class M license and ride a 2015 Moto Guzzi V7 now. Have to get the Honda sold but keep putting it off. ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è https://t.co/5UGnQfiBJc

item.description: Confirmed! The Chrome and ChromeOS Follow site option will use RSS for Feeds in the side panel. Google will provide corpus content for sites without an RSS feed that you follow. Post updated with details. https://t.co/AnerYYPw9n
item.source:markdown: Confirmed! The Chrome and ChromeOS Follow site option *will* use RSS for Feeds in the side panel. Google will provide corpus content for sites without an RSS feed that you follow. Post updated with details. https://t.co/AnerYYPw9n

item.description: @apf Sweet and thanks. And it will use standard RSS? Just want to be sure.
